channel.title: Need a very simple guide on setting up theving on npcs
channel.description: The Client and Source I'm using is called "Blank" from this youtube video "http://www(dot)youtube(dot)com/watch?v=jg60fUGSwgY&feature=plcp&context=C4a197fcVDvjVQa1PpcFM1mLPo5LHQme8key-x1vPac_7FZ0g11Ko=" but when I follow one of your tutorials i can't find SkillHandler.class...so can someone help me setup a theving interface on npcs?

item.title: Need a very simple guide on setting up theving on npcs
item.dc:creator: @MrFun MrFun
item.description:
@MrFun wrote:

The Client and Source I’m using is called “Blank” from this youtube video “http://www(dot)youtube(dot)com/watch?v=jg60fUGSwgY&feature=plcp&context=C4a197fcVDvjVQa1PpcFM1mLPo5LHQme8key-x1vPac_7FZ0g11Ko=” but when I follow one of your tutorials i can’t find SkillHandler.class…so can someone help me setup a theving interface on npcs?
